Mendokusai

Tartarus

Surviving Mars

18 Nov 2018

Today was the first time in a long time that I decided I was going to play video games all day and not feel guilty about it. I managed to go to the gym and take a long call too, but I've smashed out a solid 8 hours of Surviving Mars. It's a lot of fun, a solid 7/10 of a game, and allowing myself to relax and do something I enjoy with no pressure, for a whole day, felt great. I'm glad I still have it in me to do this.
